website_summaries.verdict: Many gardeners appreciate the lightweight design and maneuverability of this lightweight, heavy-duty hose.
pros: Light, portable, and easy to manage
Weighs 50 percent less than other standard vinyl hoses thanks to proprietary outer cover that resists punctures, leaks and abrasions
cons: Doesn't coil for storage like standard hoses
Kinks and leaks are not unheard-of with this model

customer_reviews.title: Great water hose, and Zero G is a great company.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of handling. Easy to manage. This is not our 1st zero g water hose. A leak occurred just under the rubber sleeve at the hose end after two years use. We contacted the company Zero G as the hose was warranted for 5 years normal use. They replaced the hose. Even though it developed a leak we are still happy with this hose for all the reasons stated above, and also because Zero G took care of the problem. I recommend the hose 100%.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product esp. for older/arthritic people
customer_reviews.text: Rain-snow-sleet-heat, we use hoses on our farmette to water livestock, gardens, trees. Some over a distance of 100+ feet from the faucet. The traditional plastic hoses were getting too heavy for us at our age, plus they always kinked eventually. The wife got one of these lightweight hoses in the spring and loved it. Doesn't kink nearly as easily, and doesn't hurt her arthritic hands. After a couple months, we replaced every hose on the farm. They roll up nice and compact so you can get quite a long length inside the hose roller box thing. These have really made farm life easier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Foul rubber taste in water.
customer_reviews.text: Great hose in many ways, but if you intend to use this for drinking water, think again. Water comes out with a powerful, bitter rubber taste. We have flushed it out extensively and use an inline water filter, but it’s still unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Fit & Function
customer_reviews.text: Pros: A great tuff durable kink-less and leak-less hose, that is lightweight and easy to carry, and to walk with; and at 72 years old I need all the help I can get (LOL). So far no CONS.
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: RV pleased with this hose?  Yes V R.
customer_reviews.text: This hose is wonderful!! It’s lightweight and compact. Perfect for our small motorhome. It replaced two conventional RV hoses, taking up about 1/4 of the space and weighing so much less. No kinks so it’s so much easier to handle. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: The hose is light and maneuverable.
customer_reviews.text: I've been super happy with these lightweight hoses. They are easy to move around, and after 2 seasons seem to be wearing well. A great improvement over the rubber/plastic hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not slipping, even in heat and sweat
customer_reviews.text: Used for ziplining excursions...never slipped, never had to be adjusted and wore very well with difficulty of obstacles
customer_reviews.author: muttmom

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this hose for his birthday. I used it and love that it is so lightweight that I can drag it from the back of the house to the front without struggling to water my flowers. Thus I ordered another because 50' didn't quite reach around.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great back saver hose
customer_reviews.text: I love this Jose so much I purchase another. Now I don’t break my back trying to get the hose out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price !! Great quality and very durable !! No kinking which I love !! Rolls up small to store !! Ended up buying another one shortly after I received my first one !!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back!
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight hose! Strongest expandable hose out there. I have ordered 2. Purchased one at a store.... Did leak after 3 years.... But you can still use it. These hoses come with warranties.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be as advertised. Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Did not rate durability because not used long enough. Other items have highest rating. Will purchase another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Garden Hose
customer_reviews.text: light weight, easy to use, easy to store, cost reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: nursejane

customer_reviews.title: Best hose ever.....
customer_reviews.text: I've bought more than a few hoes in my life and this one is the best hands down
customer_reviews.author: Robert Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised so far. Def light weight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: LJagger

customer_reviews.title: All you need !
customer_reviews.text: These are great hoses. Ive gone through a bunch of the rubber ones and I regret having wasted so much money when these are all you need ! These lay flat and are easily stored. They have reinforced connectors which make them easy to get on and off .
customer_reviews.author: Mrmustrd

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it doesn't crack like other hoses
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight but until summer I won't know how it responds to heat
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hustis

customer_reviews.title: It rolls into a compact for storage instead of a bulky hose on hose reel or hose hanger
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have I don’t know why I waited so long to replace my front yard hose with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these hoses in every length because they’re perfect, light weight and work great.
customer_reviews.author: M&JKLynch

customer_reviews.text: Love this hose. It’s lightweight and durable. This is my third one. Put two together for longer length.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie T.

customer_reviews.title: You can beleve what it says on the hose packaging. It's true
customer_reviews.text: I'm 78 years old and with out a doubt this hose is the very best garden hose I have ever owned. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Varney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to store. Kink free. We threw the rest of our other hoses away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hamelberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better products I have purchased blind in years. Well made with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this, and again
customer_reviews.text: Great hose. Produces less water pressure than less pliable hoses, but the handiness of this hose surpasses any concerns. Perhaps the 3)4" version allows better water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hose Ive ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these hoses for the last 3 years. They are very durable, rarely kink and lightweight. The best hose Ive ever had!
customer_reviews.author: June Stoever

customer_reviews.title: Hose
customer_reviews.text: Easy and lightweight... but will it last???? So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rajnovic

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This hose has been pretty good, my husband it more than me, but no complaints yets
customer_reviews.author: marie barnes

customer_reviews.title: Kink master
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and light but it will kink in multiple places. I called it the kink master 9000. It was really annoying. To clear the kinks I took to pulling the hose taut and eventually it gave out right at the spigot. When I went to remove the hose for replacement I discovered the fitting had corroded onto the spigot. So I just ordered a new spigot and a Flexilla hose and we'll see how that goes. In case you're wondering yes I did stretch it out and unwind it from time to time but coil it once and it's right back to kinking up again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: hose connector
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hose but I needed to remove the hose from faucet. I tried various wrenches and I could not get it to budge. Finally I had to cut the coupling to remove the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Nakaoka

customer_reviews.title: Kinks all the time and it’s new
customer_reviews.text: This hose kinks all the time so it is worthless to me
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Kinks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is the worst! Kinks easier then any hose ibhave ever owned. The slightest twist in the hise causes it to kink! Extremely annoying! Not sure how durable because i returned it after using it once. Dont buy it! And Package says kink free- lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: zero-G 5/8" x 50' Lightweight, Heavy Duty, Kink Resistant Garden Hose
product_meta.description: Size:5/8" x 50'The Zero-G has revolutionized the functionality and durability of Garden Hoses. Being 50% lighter than the average hose, the Zero-G makes gardening easier and more convenient than it has ever been. With the combined features of a patented Crush-Proof aluminum couplings, a G-Force High Density Woven Fiber Jacket and a Tru-Flex Inner Core, its durability resembles that of a commercial grade hose. 100% Drinking Water Safe & Lead Free. Assembled in the USA. Does Not Expand/Contract.
feature_bullets: 50% Lighter Weight than commercial vinyl hoses
Kink-Free, Easy to Maneuver and Store

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
